snippet: James Harden scored 40 points and had 14 assists, and the Rockets ended the Raptors’ franchise-record 12-game home winning streak.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Houston Rockets defeat Toronto Raptors, 113-107; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: James Harden scored 40 points and had 14 assists, and the Rockets ended the Raptors’ franchise-record 12-game home winning streak.

headline.print_headline: Rockets Top Raptors Behind 40 From Harden
headline.main: Rockets Top Raptors Behind 40 From Harden
